effect.scarlet_violet: Shoots a web over the opponents’ side of the field, which lowers the Speed of any opposing Pokémon that enters the field by one stage. Pokémon in the air, such as flying-types and those with levitate, are unaffected. rapid spin removes Sticky Web from the user’s side of the field; defog removes it from both sides.
effect.the_teal_mask: Shoots a web over the opponents’ side of the field, which lowers the Speed of any opposing Pokémon that enters the field by one stage. Pokémon in the air, such as flying-types and those with levitate, are unaffected. rapid spin removes Sticky Web from the user’s side of the field; defog removes it from both sides.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Shoots a web over the opponents’ side of the field, which lowers the Speed of any opposing Pokémon that enters the field by one stage. Pokémon in the air, such as flying-types and those with levitate, are unaffected. rapid spin removes Sticky Web from the user’s side of the field; defog removes it from both sides.
effect.legends_za: Shoots a web over the opponents’ side of the field, which lowers the Speed of any opposing Pokémon that enters the field by one stage. Pokémon in the air, such as flying-types and those with levitate, are unaffected. rapid spin removes Sticky Web from the user’s side of the field; defog removes it from both sides.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Covers the opposing field, lowering opponents’ Speed by one stage upon switching in.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Covers the opposing field, lowering opponents’ Speed by one stage upon switching in.

short_effect.legends_za: Covers the opposing field, lowering opponents’ Speed by one stage upon switching in.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching into battle.
